title: Neeko bug?
body: I have just updated my client and I have received the Neeko missions. I went to buy her but it says I cannot.

replies.body: Neeko hasn't (technically) been officially released yet. Best bet is that she will become available over the next few days, as is usually the case with champion releases (new champs aren't usually available as soon as the patch is live).

Ah okay,
Thanks for the reply.

I had a bug as well where she appeared in my shop but when i went to buy it took me to the bundle page

[](http://i68.tinypic.com/9zvoe9.jpg)
